unnormalised: Okay, so these smart meters, huh? Heard they're rolling them out in Bangalore. Hope they actually *work* this time! Last time, we had billing issues that made Diwali fireworks look cheap. Paying more than Rs. 5000 for less than 100 km? Something's fishy. My neighbor, Priya aunty, says her bill went through the roof! Maybe they'll be accurate enough to save us money for Onam sadhya! Fingers crossed!
